Why Choose Kongoni Technical?

Discover the advantages that make us the premier choice for technical and vocational education

Accredited Programs

Nationally recognized diploma and certificate programs that meet industry standards and employer requirements.

Industry Partnerships

Strong connections with leading employers ensuring internship opportunities and job placement for graduates.

Modern Equipment

State-of-the-art laboratories and workshops equipped with the latest technology and industry-standard tools.

Experienced Faculty

Learn from qualified instructors with extensive industry experience and academic credentials.

Career Support

Comprehensive career guidance, job placement assistance, and ongoing professional development support.

Flexible Scheduling

Day and evening classes available to accommodate working professionals and different learning preferences.

Principal's Message

"Welcome to Kongoni Technical and Vocational College, where we transform aspirations into achievements. For over two decades, our institution has been at the forefront of technical education, preparing students for successful careers in today's dynamic economy."

"We believe in hands-on learning, industry relevance, and personal development. Our graduates don't just find jobs â€“ they become leaders and innovators in their fields. Join us and be part of a community that values excellence, integrity, and continuous growth."

Ms. Judith Akaranga
